thag5.9:1.2_0: like an elephant in a stockade.
thag5.9:1.3_0: Born of the flesh, that net of the senses,
thag5.9:1.4_0: the corpse of the sensual pleasures.
thag5.9:2.2_0: like an elephant who can’t find an open gate.
thag5.9:2.3_0: Demon-mind, you won’t wander again and again,
thag5.9:3.1_0: Just as a strong trainer with a hook
thag5.9:3.2_0: takes a wild, newly captured elephant
thag5.9:3.3_0: and wins it over against its will,
thag5.9:3.4_0: this is how to keep you.
thag5.9:4.1_0: Just as a fine charioteer, skilled in the taming
thag5.9:4.2_0: of fine horses, tames a thoroughbred,
thag5.9:4.4_0: firmly established in the five powers.
thag5.9:5.3_0: kept in check by harnessed energy,
thag5.9:5.4_0: mind, you won’t go far from here.
thag5.9:5.5_0: for the senior monk who gives birth ...
